Fredonia's Forever Wild Forest
Details about forever wild at Fredonia
By Nicholas Gunner

At Fredonia, we take pride in the beauty of our campus. One area that is often overlooked is our woodlot, affectionately called the ‘Forever Wild Forest’.

Take a closer look by clicking here:

There are four main trails in the Forever Wild forest:

The North Trail is .23 miles long.

The Central Trail is .30 miles long.

The Eastern Trail is .13 miles long.

The Southern Trail is .24 miles long.

In total there are just over a half mile of wooded trails in the Forever Wild Forest and can be connected to make a much longer circuit.

 

Nicholas Gunner
@nicholas_gunner
